keyword: how many calories in a rum shot
title: How Many Calories in a Rum Shot?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a rum shot, including full nutrition breakdown, alcohol equivalents, and tweaks for mixers or variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Rum Shot?
assumptions: Standard 1.5 oz (44 ml) shot of 80-proof (40% ABV) white rum, served straight, no mixers or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, proof, serving size, and any added ingredients. Check labels or apps for precise values.

quick_answer.text: A standard rum shot contains about 97 calories, all from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Mix with 4 oz cola (adds sugar and carbs)
Dark rum with slight molasses flavor

faqs.q: How many calories in a rum shot?
faqs.a: About 97 calories for a standard 1.5 oz 80-proof rum shot.

faqs.q: Does rum have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: Pure rum has 0 g carbs and 0 g sugars; calories come solely from alcohol.

faqs.q: How does rum proof affect calories?
faqs.a: Higher proof means more alcohol and calories; 100-proof adds ~22 kcal per shot.

faqs.q: Are there fats or protein in rum?
faqs.a: Noâ€”rum is 0 g fat, 0 g protein, and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: What if I add a mixer to my rum shot?
faqs.a: Mixers like cola can add 100+ kcal; check for sugar content in the drink.
